channel.title: turmeric on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in turmeric on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Home Remedies from south India: Chicken pox
item.description: This is a continuation of the series which started with Hair Care. The other posts covered Eye care, Coughs, Digestive disorders, Head aches, and Skin care among other topics.

item.title: Home Remedies from south India: Eye care
item.description: This is a continuation of the series which started with Hair Care.Â The other posts include information about Colds, Coughs, Foot problems and Headaches. The information in this series is the knowledge of my grandmother, which I documented as part of a project on medicinal plants and home remedies.

item.title: Home Remedies from south India: Skin care
item.description: This is a continuation of the series which started with Hair Care. The other posts covered Colds, Coughs, Foot, Head aches, among other topics. The information in this series is the knowledge of my grandmother, which I documented as part of a project on medicinal plants and home remedies.

item.title: Home Remedies from south India: Coughs
item.description: This is the third post in the series which started with Hair Care. The second of which was on Colds. The information in this series is the knowledge of my grandmother, which I documented as part of a project on medicinal plants and home remedies.

item.title: Home Remedies from flora in south India: Hair Care
item.description: In my 12th grade, I did a project on the medicinal plants in my school campus with two of my classmates. As an add-on to that, we were asked to collect home remedies from people in our families.
